Sentencas: Electrochemical performance of solid oxide cells is sensitive to electrode/electrolyte interfacial chemistry.
Titulo: Tuning interfacial chemistry and electrochemical properties of solid oxide cells via cation interdiffusion

Sentencas: Herein, taking SmBaCoCuO5+delta (SBCC) oxygen electrode and Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 (GDC) electrolyte as an example, the role of cation interdiffusion in tuning interfacial chemistry and electrochemical properties of solid oxide cells was studied.
Titulo: Tuning interfacial chemistry and electrochemical properties of solid oxide cells via cation interdiffusion

Sentencas: An increase in cation diffusion between SBCC and GDC layers results in bigger and better-connected SBCC particles with slight shrinkage in unit cell and denser GDC layer with distorted crystal structure.
Titulo: Tuning interfacial chemistry and electrochemical properties of solid oxide cells via cation interdiffusion

Sentencas: Cation diffusion is also responsible for abnormal deviation in electrochemical impedance spectroscopy that can be used to characterize catalytic properties of the electrode for oxygen redox reactions in SBCC/GDC/SBCC symmetric cell.
Titulo: Tuning interfacial chemistry and electrochemical properties of solid oxide cells via cation interdiffusion

Sentencas: The internal mechanism that contributes to this phenomenon was revealed through a series of well-designed tests and theoretical modeling.
Titulo: Tuning interfacial chemistry and electrochemical properties of solid oxide cells via cation interdiffusion

Sentencas: Single cell, SBCC/GDC/GDC-NiO, has high cation interdiffusion, works well in both solid oxide fuel cell and solid oxide electrolysis cell model; it also exhibits decreased catalytic activity and open-circuit voltage.
Titulo: Tuning interfacial chemistry and electrochemical properties of solid oxide cells via cation interdiffusion

Sentencas: This work provides helpful guides for the design of advanced solid oxide cells and other related devices.
Titulo: Tuning interfacial chemistry and electrochemical properties of solid oxide cells via cation interdiffusion
